CustomField.formula:
AND(
Blended_Discount__c > Approved_Discount__c, OR( RecordTypeId = '0121a000000VnAB', RecordTypeId = '0121a000000VnUx' ),
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), Blended_Discount__c > 0.102 ),
AND(
ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Non Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c , 'Direct Monthly'),
OR( AND(License_Term__c < 60, Blended_Discount__c > 0.05), AND(License_Term__c >=60, Blended_Discount__c > 0.15) ) ),
OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Non Express'),
OR(
AND( License_Term__c < 36, Blended_Discount__c >= 0.00 ), AND( License_Term__c >= 36, License_Term__c < 60, Blended_Discount__c > 0.25 ), AND( License_Term__c >= 60, Blended_Discount__c > 0.35) ) )
) ) )
CustomField.label: Industrial Discount Approval Needed
